description: Blake revealed that he has a bit of a crush on Manny, and requested to be paired up with him. Well, he got what he wanted! Manny was more than happy to satisfy his wishes…in more ways than one. “I’m excited to fuck him! It’s been a while since I’ve gotten to just top.” Blake shows his topping skills, while Manny continues to shows us he can take anybody on.
title: Blake & Manny: Bareback
